title: maahita pravriddha
sahitya:
mahita pravrddha shrImati guha gaNapati janani

anupallavi

 pAhi vadana sudhAkarE shrIkarE pAhi suguNa ratnAkarE

caraNam 1

 dEhi caraNa bhaktmakhila dEhini sadA phaladE himagiri tanayE vaidEhipa sahOdari
   
caraNam 2

 vAhinIsha sannutE navAhi bhISa vallabhE bhavAhi nIlakaNThI simha vAhini janani
   
caraNam 3

 pArtha sannutapriyE padArtha puNyadUrE kAmitArtha phaladE shrI tapastIrthapura nivAsini
   
caraNam 4

 rAja shEkharAtma bhuvi rAja rAja sannutE sarOja daLa nibhAkSi tyAgarAja bhAgya dAyaki
